data.title: Your elected representatives
data.meta_description: Croydon councillors, councillor attendance and allowances, Cabinet members and Shadow Cabinet members, Croydon MPs and your local London Assembly Member.
data.text:
All information on Croydon councillors, Cabinet members, MPs and London Assembly Members is available on democracy.croydon.gov.uk.

There are 70 councillors representing wards across the London Borough of Croydon.

Croydon councillors

Your local councillors

Councillor attendance

Councillor allowances

Croydon Cabinet

Find out which councillors sit in the Cabinet and in the Shadow Cabinet.

Croydon Cabinet members

Croydon Shadow Cabinet members

Croydon Cabinet member bulletins

Croydon MPs

There are 3 Members of Parliament representing the parliamentary constituencies of Croydon South, Croydon North and Croydon Central.

Your local MPs

The London Assembly

There is one Member of the London Assembly, representing Croydon and Sutton.
